text: @albamonica @AndrewFeinberg Also, if WH pushes outdoor press pool chairs close together, as they recently have, the members of the press must move the chairs apart themselves. Trump thinks if he changes the optics of coronavirus, voters will not see their friends & relatives getting sick & dying.
